attributes.action: Stop Great Britain being destroyed by the lawless society that it is becoming!
attributes.additional_details:
At the heart of any good society is good law & order, if you take away law & order a country will bit by bit have it's very fabric destroyed. Setting society as a whole back decades, maybe even by a generation. 
We all hear stories of an absolute increase in crime & the police totally stretched & unable to fully cope. 
We must 'as a nation' stand up & insist our government must return police numbers to the levels needed to protect our society - Sign the petition to demand 20000 more police now!
attributes.background:
The government are on a totally blind journey by over 20000 police officers cut, The result: Decades of damage are being done to the fabric of 'OUR' country by this insane policy of cutting police! 
Law & order is the cement that holds together any prosperous, fair & decent society!
